title: Introduction to Music
content: Children are introduced to simple music sounds using claps, drums, shakers, and singing. Music builds rhythm, memory, and joy in learning.

title: Singing Rhymes
content: Rhymes are fun and educational songs that help children learn new words and improve memory. Pupils practice with popular rhymes and actions.

title: Clap and Dance
content: Children learn body movement and rhythm by clapping, dancing, and following simple moves.

title: Listening Skills
content: Children practice listening to sounds, voices, and music instruments. Listening improves concentration and memory.
examples: Guess the sound of a bell 🔔

title: Introduction to Current Affairs
content: Pupils are introduced to their immediate world — family, school, and environment. They learn about simple daily events.
